name: mcp-server-tavily
description: Integrates AI models with web search and data extraction tools.

rating.reason: Exceptional documentation quality across all tools. Names are specific and clearly indicate purpose (tavily-search, tavily-extract, tavily-crawl, tavily-map). Descriptions are comprehensive, providing 2-4 sentences covering functionality, usage context, and key benefits. Parameter documentation is thorough with clear purposes, well-defined constraints, and helpful examples. Notable strengths include detailed enum values, appropriate defaults, and context-specific guidance (e.g., LinkedIn-specific recommendations). The toolset demonstrates consistent excellence in documentation standards.
